DOC.brief_summary: This study aims to assess the safety, tolerability, and pharmacokinetics of PF-04958242 at a number of ascending doses administered for 14 days in healthy volunteers.
DOC.brief_title: Multiple Dose Tolerance Study For PF-04958242
DOC.detailed_description: A decision was made to terminate the B1701002 study so that emerging data from the study and from a preclinical study in rats could be further examined and incorporated into a new study design and protocol.
DOC.criteria: males or females of nonchildbearing capacity No medical, neurological or psychiatric illness
